text: The 2018–19 CAA men's basketball season will mark the 34th season of Colonial Athletic Association basketball, taking place between November 2018 and March 2019. Practices commenced in October 2018, and the season will end with the 2019 CAA Men's Basketball Tournament. == Head Coaches == === Coaching Changes === There were no coaching changes following the 2017–18 season. === Coaches === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%;" |- ! width="110" | Team !
